name: Drive Isle
description:
Drive Isle is an open world driving game mainly focused on random driving
and drifting, if you will.

• Semi-realistic driving physics
• Hundreds of kilometers of road to drive
• Gas stations & adjustable fuel consumption
• Adjustable visual & mechanical damage
• Interior (cockpit) view in all vehicles
• 30+ real world resembling vehicles
• Various missions and races to earn money
• Option to start new game owning all vehicles and just drive
• Performance and visual upgrades & gadgets such as additional gauges
• Multiple houses with parking slots to purchase
• 2000km² sized map with a winter area up north
• Inventory system (find / sell / store / purchase / use items)

Note: Lighting & HDR bloom varies in the screenshots & videos.
The lighting overall still needs more work..
